post.body: HA! never ceases to be really cool and kinda scary at the same time. :)

BLASPHEMY! ;)
ROFLMAO! Safety first!
Interesting solution. I hear my teacher friends complain all the time about printing cost cuts.
hahaa, just don't let it happen again ok!? ;)
hey, how did i get into this? besides i'm enjoying this way too much to attempt to cease. :-)
@kristinbeth524 Oh buddy, the L-bomb was just dropped. :)
I could tell you, but then I'd have to kill you. And I really wouldn't like that very much.
Hahaa!!! Whaaa?! O:-)
shit i forgot and an already on my way w kris we will raid daves
I moved away from Cleve over 2 years ago and still remember those sandwiches. :) Also miss Mongolian BBQ in Coventry. <3
hahaa!! My bad.
Philly Cheesesteak hands down. There's one in Tower City but the little one on Superior in the Hyatt is the best.
you've been awful quiet over there....
Hahaa!! I knew it. I ate there a LOT. :)
I use IE and Firefox for at work browsing at the same time. I use FF and Safari at home. You are not the only one. :)

I'll send you pictures from the cruise! :-D
OooOoo Glitter Gmail Stickers... Verra nice!
sounds ridiculously painful. definitely will be praying for him.
nice! :) the site takes me back when i used to make coupons for my parents as presents for doing dishes, hugs and stuff like that :)
Stitch says hi and he misses you. Hanging with him for a bit and giving him meds.
ooOoooOooOoooOoo!!!!!
Hi Jack! :)
whoa, packing mania. :)
good, I was not really impressed with the movie at all. Hopefully New Moon will be better. Then again books r usually better

multiplier of 10, actually. :) I could go the other way too "I'm sorry you're ruining my follower #, i'm gonna have to block you."
ok that got a very loud lol.
I'm with you. Although... I only have 444 more followers to go until I reach 1,000! Even numbers FTW! :)
hahaa! thanks :) congrats by the way.
srsly. trying to keep everything straight is next to impossible sometimes. yeesh.
I think you mean thanks to @AshPash? I cannot take credit for those posts. :)
yay, one of my favorite tunes. :) if I would've seen your post earlier I would've played.

whatever, those shirts aren't half as cool as you are! psha!

hahaa! I was waiting for that. :)
YAY! :)
I've already got you penciled in. :)

you and me both. Bleh.

That is really....gross.
It's probably just because it's Christmas time. I've always just walked in, never had an appointment for buying questions.
hahaa, yes I remember that. Ah, those were the days...
:-D Thank @ScottHepburn and @LisaHoffmann they started it. :)
Yes, it's enabled. But still can't get it to work. I'm not worried about it, just kinda disappointed. Oh wells.
Yeah I tried editing contact & adding mobile that way. But still when click 'Send SMS' still asks for a mobile #. :shrug:
that's what i did but it's not saving the mobile number to the contacts, so it's just asking for it over and over again.
besides I'm a n00b. So I'm not sure what to expect.
Honestly not sure yet. Just trying to get thru the holidays first. Then I'll start thinking about January. :)
it's too bad they dont do more touring in the states. le sigh. p.s. happy monday! Also, 2.5 weeks. Not that I'm counting. :)

aint that the troof! here too. ;) We only have 1 life to live so why not, right? Welcome back. :)

Gogogogogogo! :)

amen, sister. amen.

w00t w00t!

Hangin with @kristinbeth524's cat while she is out of town. Looking forward to sleeping but despite the tired this weekend has been awesome.
